      • getItem

        public MenuItem getItem(int itemNo)
        Get a MenuItem from the menu identified by it's item number.
        Parameters:
        itemNo - The identifier for a particular item.
        Returns:

      • loadDatabase

        public boolean loadDatabase(java.lang.String file)
        Deserialise a Menu from a database given a file to use as a database.
        Specified by:
        loadDatabase in interface Manager
        Parameters:
        file - The file to use as the database.
        Returns:
        Return True if the database was found and successfully loaded.

      • save

        Serialise the MenuItems on the Menu and write them to the database.

      • newItem

        public void newItem(MenuItem item)
        Add a new item to the menu.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be added to the menu.

      • nextItemNo

        public int nextItemNo()
        Increment and return the next available Item ID number.
        Returns:
        An int representing the next unused item ID number.

      • removeItem

        public boolean removeItem(int itemNo)
        Remove an item from the menu.
        Parameters:
        itemNo - The item number of the item to be removed.
        Returns:
        Returns True if the item was successfully removed. If the item number does not exist within the menu it will return False.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a text representation of the menu in the format: ID Item Price 0 Pizza $9.50 1 Apples $0.30
